text: we used to have such wild dreams the
kind that brought us together made us a
movement we dream we'd split the atom
walk on the moon unlock our very genetic
code and to those who said impossible
can't happen won happen we didn't hear a
word we we stood up and we Chang the
world stand up stand up for everyone who
can't rise anymore one every minute one
life in a moment taken by a disease that
we can actually cure we can actually and
in the time it's taken to say these
unforgivable this is where the end of
cancer begins when together rise as one
when we stand up stand up stand up stand
